moduleMetadataJson.name: VMware vCenter Server vmdir Information Disclosure
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module uses an anonymous-bind LDAP connection to dump data from
          the vmdir service in VMware vCenter Server version 6.7 prior to the
          6.7U3f update.
author: wvu <wvu@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'
